title: Will U.S. Citizens Need a New Visa to Visit Europe Starting in 2021?
subtitle: What exactly is the European Union planning? And what, if anything, did they announce in March 2019?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In March 2019, the European Union announced that, beginning in 2021, certain non-European travellers (including U.S. citizens) would require a visa to visit Europe.
